long_description: Whip up a restaurant-style gourmet breakfast with the Camp Chef 1-Burner Professional griddle. Griddle fits over 1 burner of most Camp Chef 2-burner stoves, including the Yukon, Outdoorsman, Explorer and Pro 60 stoves (sold separately). Steel griddle comes with a seasoned finished that is ready for use right out of the box. High sides keep your food from falling off the griddle. Convenient grease drain catches grease. Griddle includes a grease cup holder. Please note: Camp Chef 1-Burner Professional griddle does not fit on the Camp Chef Sport Grill, Tahoe Triple Burner or the Pro 90 3-Burner stoves.
short_description: Whip up a restaurant-style gourmet breakfast with the Camp Chef 1-Burner Professional griddle.
